author: Kitty Greenwald
title: Botanica’s Rice-Noodle Salad With Lots of Fresh Herbs
text:
“EVERYTHING IN moderation,” said Heather Sperling, co-owner of Botanica in Los Angeles. “But more of a few things! More vegetables, more acid, more herbs.” There’s more of all of that in this Vietnamese-inspired rice-noodle salad, the final Slow Food Fast contribution from Ms. Sperling and her co-chef and co-owner, Emily Fiffer.
To make the dish as nourishing as it is delicious, the chefs toss in generous handfuls of salad greens, whole bunches of basil, mint and cilantro, and a good amount of lemongrass. Fennel, cucumbers,...
